entry.title: [Dordogne/France][Internet Access] - xDSL
entry.content:
Mar 18, 16:26 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/03/2022 15:30 UTC
End Time : 18/03/2022 10:45 UTC
Service impact : Some subscriber connection nodes (SNNs) are affected by loss of connections.
Root cause : A default on the operator's infrastructure was the cause of this issue. the defect has now been corrected.
Current status : Resolved

Mar 17, 07:29 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 15/03/2022 15:30 UTC
Service impact : Some subscriber connection nodes (SNNs) were affected by loss of connections.
Ongoing actions : An adduction of the Bergerac (24) collection router was involved, it has been deactivated to stabilize the links. There is no more impact to be expected. The links remain under surveillance and the optical module will be changed. We will keep you informed soon.

Mar 16, 15:01 UTC
Update - Update : We have identified LDP tunnel bugs (tunnel in charge of access authentication) on our DSLAM cluster between PÃ©rigueux and Bordeaux. Investigations are underway to resolve this behavior.

Mar 16, 10:29 UTC
Update - Update : Actions are underway to determine the equipment generating this behavior. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Mar 15, 17:22 UTC
Identified - Start time : 15/03/2022 15:30 UTC
Service impact : Some subscriber connection nodes (SNNs) are affected by loss of connections.
Ongoing actions : We have re-launched the provider to resolve the incident. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
